law.catch_line: Costs of remediation of property as eligible costs.
law.text: Costs incurred by an applicant in remediating a property in accordance with KRS 224.1-510 to 224.1-532 shall be considered eligible costs for the purposes of KRS 154.26-010 to 154.26-100.
law.history: Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 13, effective June 21, 2001.
